quotes.quote: Successful organizing forces you to look at the big picture, not one small section of the frame, so that the system you design will be complete.
quotes.author: Julie Morgenstern
quotes.known for: Author, Organization and Time Management Consultant

quotes.quote: Organizing is what you do before you do something, so that when you do it, it is not all mixed up.
quotes.author: A.A. Milne

quotes.quote: For every minute spent in organizing, an hour is earned.
quotes.author: Benjamin Franklin
quotes.known for: One of the Founding Fathers of the United States

quotes.quote: Once you have a clear idea of your priorities â€“ that is your values, goals and high leverage activities, organize around them.
quotes.author: Stephen Covey
quotes.known for: author known for "The 7 Habits of Highly Effective People"

quotes.quote: Keep your face always toward the sunshine, and shadows will fall behind you.
quotes.author: Walt Whitman

quotes.quote: You are never too old to set another goal or to dream a new dream.
quotes.author: C.S. Lewis

quotes.quote: Life is like riding a bicycle. To keep your balance, you must keep moving.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.quote: It isn't where you came from. It's where you're going that counts.
quotes.author: Ella Fitzgerald
quotes.known for: American Jazz Singer, Queen of Jazz

quotes.quote: If you have good thoughts they will shine out of your face like sunbeams and you will always look lovely.
quotes.author: Roald Dahl
